item.title: Kurdish Distrust of Syria’s New Government Runs Deep
item.description: The Kurdish-led force that runs northeast Syria has agreed to integrate into a new national army, but some of its supporters remain wary.

item.title: One Key to a Successful Campaign for Pope? Act Like You’re Not Campaigning.
item.description: Crucial meetings will be held this week in which contenders begin jockeying in earnest for the job of leading the Roman Catholic Church.
